tool_description: Tracks developmental milestones related to physical growth and motor development, comparing against age-appropriate expectations.

milestone_category.description: Category of milestone (gross_motor, fine_motor, physical_growth, or all)

achieved_milestones.description: List of milestones the child has achieved

error_messages: Invalid age: Age must be between 0 and 240 months.
Invalid milestone category: Must be 'gross_motor', 'fine_motor', 'physical_growth', or 'all'.
Invalid observation date: Date must be valid and not in the future.
Unrecognized milestones: Some milestones in the list are not recognized for this age group.
usage: Provide child's age, milestone category, and observation date. Optionally include achieved milestones. The tool compares against developmental expectations.

milestone_status.description: Overall milestone development status (on_track, ahead, behind, or concerning)

upcoming_milestones.description: Milestones to watch for in coming months
